mission.title: Mission
mission.desc: At California International Academy, we are committed to providing students with access to a high-quality, globally-minded education where their unique experiences, cultures, and backgrounds are celebrated. We empower students through hands-on, project-based learning that inspires creativity, critical thinking, and real-world problem-solving, preparing them for success in higher education and beyond.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: Our vision is to be a vibrant and inclusive learning community where students feel valued, supported, and inspired to reach their full potential, academically, socially, and personally, while developing the skills and confidence needed to thrive in an interconnected world.

values.title: Values
values.desc: We value diversity, inclusion, and academic excellence, fostering a learning environment that respects and celebrates individual differences.

accreditation.title: The Credibility of California International Academy
accreditation.subtitle: Commitment to Academic Excellence
accreditation.description: Our priority is to offer an excellent educational experience. Therefore, we are actively pursuing **regional and national accreditation** to ensure our programs meet the highest quality standards, recognized by universities, colleges, and companies worldwide. This rigorous process demonstrates our commitment to continuous improvement and academic quality.

highSchool.desc: A comprehensive curriculum that prepares students for higher education and future careers, with a focus on advanced subjects and university preparation.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.subtitle: Learn on your schedule â with live support when you want it
gettingStarted.description1: The flexibility of asynchronous learning at California International Academy
gettingStarted.description2: At California International Academy, we combine the freedom of asynchronous learning with the connection of live instruction. Students enjoy the flexibility to study at their own pace while having the option to join live weekend classes and after-school support sessions for deeper learning, collaboration, and one-on-one help.

accessAnytime.title: Access Learning Anytime, Anywhere
accessAnytime.desc: Our online platform is available 24/7, so students can learn from anywhere in the world on their schedule. The coursework is self-paced, allowing for personalized progress and flexibility to balance school with other commitments.

liveWeekendClasses.title: Live Weekend Classes for Global Connection
liveWeekendClasses.desc: Each weekend, students can join live virtual classes led by our certified teachers. These interactive sessions bring peers together for discussions, project collaboration, and hands-on activities that enrich the online learning experience.

afterSchoolSupport.title: After-School Support for Student Success
afterSchoolSupport.desc: Our dedicated after-school sessions provide extra academic help, tutoring, and guidance. Whether students need clarification on assignments, test preparation, or feedback on projects, our teachers are available to ensure no one is left behind.

rigorousCurriculum.title: Rigorous Curriculum with Global Standards
rigorousCurriculum.desc: Our courses are designed by education professionals and aligned with U.S. standards, ensuring academic excellence that is recognized worldwide. Project-based learning encourages creativity, problem-solving, and real-world application.

balancedApproach.title: A Balanced Approach â Independence with Support
balancedApproach.desc: We give students the freedom to shape their learning while providing a strong support network when they need it. From self-paced coursework to live weekend classes and after-school help, every student has the resources to thrive.

technicalRequirements.title: Technical Requirements
technicalRequirements.subtitle: The tools you need to succeed.
technicalRequirements.desc: To make the most of your learning experience at California International Academy, students must have access to the following:

computer.title: 1. Computer or Laptop
computer.desc: A reliable device with a modern operating system:
specs: At least 8 GB of RAM and 120 GB of storage are recommended

internet.title: 2. Stable Internet Connection
specs: Minimum speed: 5 Mbps download / 2 Mbps upload
Recommended speed: 10 Mbps or higher for video conferencing and streaming course content

webcam.title: 3. Webcam and Microphone
specs: Built-in or external webcam for live classes and meetings
Clear microphone or headset for communication during live sessions

browser.title: 4. Updated Web Browser
specs: Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, or Safari (latest version)

software.title: 5. Productivity Software
specs: Access to Google Workspace (Docs, Slides, Sheets, Drive) â provided by the school

platformAccess.title: 6. Learning Platform Access
specs: Login credentials for the California International Academy online learning system (provided upon enrollment)

supplies.title: 7. Additional Supplies for Hands-On Projects (varies by course)
specs: Project-specific kits or materials (either provided or listed in the course syllabus)

graduationRequirements.title: Graduation Requirements
graduationRequirements.desc1: To graduate from California International Academy, you must meet the graduation requirements.
graduationRequirements.desc2: California sets minimum requirements for graduation, and local school districts add their own set of requirements.
